message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%
You took 60%, I'll take 70% this time. Your turn to negotiate!
That's a big swing in your favor. I'd like to propose a 55-45 split, with me getting $385,000 and you getting $615,000.
Considering the reduced value of the money, I'll offer a 42-58 split. This way, we both get a decent share of the remaining value.
You offered 42%, I'll counter with a 45-55 split. Meeting in the middle?
I'm not sure if we're meeting in the middle, Bob. I'd like to propose a 47-53 split, with me getting $434,000 and you getting $566,000. Let's see if we can get even closer to the middle.
I'm getting closer to the middle. I'll offer a 43.5-56.5 split, with me getting $435,000 and you getting $565,000. Let's see if we can finally agree on a deal.
